title: Best Udyr OCE
body:
Krugs agro is too much for this Udyr.
{{item:3070}} {{champion:77}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I played AP Yorick jungle last night, His ghouls smash down that patience metre too, Not sure if it is a bug or what -_-
It's not, if the camp is forced to switch targets it loses patience.
